actions.name: Actions
actions.description:
Breath Attack [Attack | Half damage on a pass] (Recharge Cd6): See table. Take an Action to begin this Attack, which occurs on this Being's next Turn.
Multi-Attack: 2×Claw and 1×Bite
Bite [Melee Attack]: 9 (2d8)
Claw [Melee Attack]: 3 (d6)
Tail [Melee Attack]: 5 (d8) and shoved Prone 10' away

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Immutable: It can't be transformed.
Magic Ward II: Cast Checks that include it as a Target have a d6 penalty.
Dragon Types: Red (Fire immune, Near Cone 14/4d6 fire+Burning), Blue (Shock immune, Far Line 13/2d12 shock+Dazed), Green (Poison immune, 15' Aura 10/3d6 poison+Sickened)
